name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: E-commerce Product Research & Image Search Tool
name.zh_CN: 跨境电商选品 & 以图搜图工具

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Discover best sellers and trending products on Amazon, Shopify, Shein, Temu, Facebook, Ins and TikTok, dropshipping image search
short.zh_CN: 实时监控Amazon, Shopify, Shein, Temu, Fb, Ins, TikTok爆款、热卖款、趋势款、历史销量及销售额数据，大数据选品支持以图搜图

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this powerful extension, you can implement image search when browsing any e-commerce websites like Amazon, Shopify, Shein, Temu and more. Simply right click on the product image you are interested and click image search!

The image search function allows you to compare prices between platforms, source any products for dropshipping, find the cheapest and most trusted supplier, an effective way to do market research and competitive analysis.

You can also visit Diffshop.com using the extension, Diffshop is the ultimate e-commerce spy tool, platforms we cover include: Amazon, Shopify, Shein, Temu, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok. Features include: product research, e-commerce store data, keyword tool and adspy. Discover best sellers and top trending products for dropshipping.
long.zh_CN:
用户可以通过此插件在访问电商网站对任意商品图片时进行以图搜图，只需要鼠标在图片点击右键选择以图搜图即可

以图搜图可以帮助找到同款货源，进行有效选品、找到同款竞品、进行有效市场研究、比价、竞争对手分析、供应链比对以及成本利润分析。

用户可以通过此插件访问Diffshop店湖：Diffshop店湖是一款海外电商平台/独立站/社媒广告一站式数据监控及选品工具。包含：Amazon商品数据、Shopify店铺数据、Shopify商品数据、Shopify关键词数据、Shein商品数据、Temu商品数据、谷歌电商关键词数据、Facebook电商广告数据、Instagram电商广告数据和TikTok电商广告数据。通过实时监控热销商品、趋势商品、历史销量信息、流量、关键词、外链等全方位信息帮助卖家进行有效的市场研究、竞争对手分析、选品、SEO、Listing及广告投放优化。
